verses.kjv: These are the sons of Israel; Reuben, Simeon, Levi, and Judah, Issachar, and Zebulun,
verses.ct: These were the sons of Israel: Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issachar, Zebulun,

verses.kjv: Dan, Joseph, and Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, and Asher.
verses.ct: Dan, Joseph, Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, and Asher.

verses.kjv: The sons of Judah; Er, and Onan, and Shelah: which three were born unto him of the daughter of Shua the Canaanitess. And Er, the firstborn of Judah, was evil in the sight of the LORD; and he slew him.
verses.ct: Judah's sons were Er, Onan, and Shelah. These 3 were born to him by Bathshua, a Canaanite woman. Er, Judah's oldest son, was wicked in the LORD's judgment, so the LORD killed him.

verses.kjv: And Tamar his daughter in law bore him Pharez and Zerah. All the sons of Judah were five.
verses.ct: Judah's daughter-in-law Tamar gave birth to Pharez and Zerah for him. Judah had 5 sons in all.

verses.kjv: The sons of Pharez; Hezron, and Hamul.
verses.ct: The sons of Pharez were Hezron and Hamul.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Zerah; Zimri, and Ethan, and Heman, and Calcol, and Dara: five of them in all.
verses.ct: Zerah's sons were Zimri, Ethan, Heman, Calcol, and Dara — 5 altogether.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Carmi; Achar, the troubler of Israel, who transgressed in the thing accursed.
verses.ct: The son of Carmi was Achar, who brought disaster on Israel by violating the ban on devoted things.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Ethan; Azariah.
verses.ct: Ethan's son was Azariah.

verses.kjv: The sons also of Hezron, that were born unto him; Jerahmeel, and Ram, and Chelubai.
verses.ct: The sons born to Hezron were Jerahmeel, Ram, and Chelubai.

verses.kjv: And Ram begat Amminadab; and Amminadab begat Nahshon, prince of the children of Judah;
verses.ct: Ram became the father of Amminadab, and Amminadab became the father of Nahshon, a leader among the people of Judah.

verses.kjv: And Nahshon begat Salma, and Salma begat Boaz,
verses.ct: Nahshon became the father of Salma, and Salma became the father of Boaz.

verses.kjv: And Boaz begat Obed, and Obed begat Jesse,
verses.ct: Boaz became the father of Obed, and Obed became the father of Jesse.

verses.kjv: And Jesse begat his firstborn Eliab, and Abinadab the second, and Shimma the third,
verses.ct: Jesse's 1st son was Eliab, his 2nd was Abinadab, and his 3rd was Shimma.

verses.kjv: Nethaneel the fourth, Raddai the fifth,
verses.ct: Nethaneel was the 4th, and Raddai was the 5th.

verses.kjv: Ozem the sixth, David the seventh:
verses.ct: Ozem was the 6th, and David was the 7th.

verses.kjv: Whose sisters were Zeruiah, and Abigail. And the sons of Zeruiah; Abishai, and Joab, and Asahel, three.
verses.ct: Their sisters were Zeruiah and Abigail. Zeruiah had 3 sons: Abishai, Joab, and Asahel.

verses.kjv: And Abigail bare Amasa: and the father of Amasa was Jether the Ishmeelite.
verses.ct: Abigail gave birth to Amasa, whose father was Jether the Ishmeelite.

verses.kjv: And Caleb the son of Hezron begat children of Azubah his wife, and of Jerioth: her sons are these; Jesher, and Shobab, and Ardon.
verses.ct: Caleb son of Hezron had children with his wife Azubah and with Jerioth. Her sons were Jesher, Shobab, and Ardon.

verses.kjv: And when Azubah was dead, Caleb took unto him Ephrath, which bare him Hur.
verses.ct: After Azubah died, Caleb married Ephrath, who gave birth to Hur for him.

verses.kjv: And Hur begat Uri, and Uri begat Bezaleel.
verses.ct: Hur became the father of Uri, and Uri became the father of Bezaleel.

verses.kjv: And afterward Hezron went in to the daughter of Machir the father of Gilead, whom he married when he was threescore years old; and she bare him Segub.
verses.ct: Later, Hezron had relations with the daughter of Machir, the founder of Gilead. He married her when he was 60 years old, and she gave birth to Segub.

verses.kjv: And Segub begat Jair, who had three and twenty cities in the land of Gilead.
verses.ct: Segub became the father of Jair, who controlled 23 towns in the territory of Gilead.

verses.kjv: And he took Geshur, and Aram, with the towns of Jair, from them, with Kenath, and the towns thereof, even threescore cities. All these belonged to the sons of Machir the father of Gilead.
verses.ct: But Geshur and Aram captured the towns of Jair, along with Kenath and its surrounding villages — 60 towns total. All of these had belonged to the descendants of Machir, the founder of Gilead.

verses.kjv: And after that Hezron was dead in Calebephratah, then Abiah Hezron’s wife bare him Ashur the father of Tekoa.
verses.ct: After Hezron died in Calebephratah, his wife Abiah gave birth to Ashur, the founder of Tekoa.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Jerahmeel the firstborn of Hezron were, Ram the firstborn, and Bunah, and Oren, and Ozem, and Ahijah.
verses.ct: The sons of Jerahmeel, Hezron's oldest, were Ram (the firstborn), Bunah, Oren, Ozem, and Ahijah.

verses.kjv: Jerahmeel had also another wife, whose name was Atarah; she was the mother of Onam.
verses.ct: Jerahmeel also had a second wife named Atarah, who was Onam's mother.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Ram the firstborn of Jerahmeel were, Maaz, and Jamin, and Eker.
verses.ct: The sons of Ram, Jerahmeel's firstborn, were Maaz, Jamin, and Eker.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Onam were, Shammai, and Jada. And the sons of Shammai; Nadab, and Abishur.
verses.ct: Onam's sons were Shammai and Jada. Shammai's sons were Nadab and Abishur.

verses.kjv: And the name of the wife of Abishur was Abihail, and she bare him Ahban, and Molid.
verses.ct: Abishur's wife was named Abihail, and she gave birth to Ahban and Molid.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Nadab; Seled, and Appaim: but Seled died without children.
verses.ct: Nadab's sons were Seled and Appaim, but Seled died with no children.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Appaim; Ishi. And the sons of Ishi; Sheshan. And the children of Sheshan; Ahlai.
verses.ct: Appaim's son was Ishi. Ishi's son was Sheshan. Sheshan's descendant was Ahlai.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Jada the brother of Shammai; Jether, and Jonathan: and Jether died without children.
verses.ct: The sons of Jada, Shammai's brother, were Jether and Jonathan. Jether died with no children.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Jonathan; Peleth, and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.
verses.ct: Jonathan's sons were Peleth and Zaza. These were all descendants of Jerahmeel.

verses.kjv: Now Sheshan had no sons, but daughters. And Sheshan had a servant, an Egyptian, whose name was Jarha.
verses.ct: Sheshan had no sons, only daughters. He had an Egyptian servant named Jarha.

verses.kjv: And Sheshan gave his daughter to Jarha his servant to wife; and she bare him Attai.
verses.ct: Sheshan gave his daughter in marriage to his servant Jarha, and she gave birth to Attai.

verses.kjv: And Attai begat Nathan, and Nathan begat Zabad,
verses.ct: Attai became the father of Nathan, and Nathan became the father of Zabad.

verses.kjv: And Zabad begat Ephlal, and Ephlal begat Obed,
verses.ct: Zabad became the father of Ephlal, and Ephlal became the father of Obed.

verses.kjv: And Obed begat Jehu, and Jehu begat Azariah,
verses.ct: Obed became the father of Jehu, and Jehu became the father of Azariah.

verses.kjv: And Azariah begat Helez, and Helez begat Eleasah,
verses.ct: Azariah became the father of Helez, and Helez became the father of Eleasah.

verses.kjv: And Eleasah begat Sisamai, and Sisamai begat Shallum,
verses.ct: Eleasah became the father of Sisamai, and Sisamai became the father of Shallum.

verses.kjv: And Shallum begat Jekamiah, and Jekamiah begat Elishama.
verses.ct: Shallum became the father of Jekamiah, and Jekamiah became the father of Elishama.

verses.kjv: Now the sons of Caleb the brother of Jerahmeel were, Mesha his firstborn, which was the father of Ziph; and the sons of Mareshah the father of Hebron.
verses.ct: The sons of Caleb, Jerahmeel's brother, were Mesha his firstborn (the founder of Ziph) and the sons of Mareshah, the founder of Hebron.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Hebron; Korah, and Tappuah, and Rekem, and Shema.
verses.ct: Hebron's sons were Korah, Tappuah, Rekem, and Shema.

verses.kjv: And Shema begat Raham, the father of Jorkoam: and Rekem begat Shammai.
verses.ct: Shema became the father of Raham, the founder of Jorkoam. Rekem became the father of Shammai.

verses.kjv: And the son of Shammai was Maon: and Maon was the father of Bethzur.
verses.ct: Shammai's son was Maon, and Maon was the founder of Bethzur.

verses.kjv: And Ephah, Caleb’s concubine, bare Haran, and Moza, and Gazez: and Haran begat Gazez.
verses.ct: Ephah, Caleb's secondary wife, gave birth to Haran, Moza, and Gazez. Haran became the father of Gazez.

verses.kjv: And the sons of Jahdai; Regem, and Jotham, and Gesham, and Pelet, and Ephah, and Shaaph.
verses.ct: Jahdai's sons were Regem, Jotham, Gesham, Pelet, Ephah, and Shaaph.

verses.kjv: Maachah, Caleb’s concubine, bare Sheber, and Tirhanah.
verses.ct: Maachah, Caleb's secondary wife, gave birth to Sheber and Tirhanah.

verses.kjv: She bare also Shaaph the father of Madmannah, Sheva the father of Machbenah, and the father of Gibea: and the daughter of Caleb was Achsa.
verses.ct: She also gave birth to Shaaph, the founder of Madmannah, and Sheva, the founder of Machbenah and Gibea. Caleb's daughter was Achsa.

verses.kjv: These were the sons of Caleb the son of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah; Shobal the father of Kirjathjearim,
verses.ct: These were the descendants of Caleb. The sons of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah, were Shobal the founder of Kirjathjearim,

verses.kjv: Salma the father of Bethlehem, Hareph the father of Bethgader.
verses.ct: Salma the founder of Bethlehem, and Hareph the founder of Bethgader.

verses.kjv: And Shobal the father of Kirjathjearim had sons; Haroeh, and half of the Manahethites.
verses.ct: Shobal, the founder of Kirjathjearim, had descendants: Haroeh and half of the Manahethites.

verses.kjv: And the families of Kirjathjearim; the Ithrites, and the Puhites, and the Shumathites, and the Mishraites; of them came the Zareathites, and the Eshtaulites.
verses.ct: The clans of Kirjathjearim were the Ithrites, the Puhites, the Shumathites, and the Mishraites. From these came the Zareathites and the Eshtaulites.

verses.kjv: The sons of Salma; Bethlehem, and the Netophathites, Ataroth, the house of Joab, and half of the Manahethites, the Zorites.
verses.ct: The descendants of Salma included Bethlehem, the Netophathites, Ataroth, the house of Joab, half of the Manahethites, and the Zorites.

verses.kjv: And the families of the scribes which dwelt at Jabez; the Tirathites, the Shimeathites, and Suchathites. These are the Kenites that came of Hemath, the father of the house of Rechab.
verses.ct: The clans of scribes who lived at Jabez were the Tirathites, the Shimeathites, and the Suchathites. These were the Kenites who descended from Hemath, the founder of the house of Rechab.
